American League CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Purchased the contract of RHP Jon Garland from Charlotte of the International League. MINNESOTA TWINS--Agreed to terms with RHP Brad Radke on a four-year contract. OAKLAND ATHLETICS--Recalled RHP Chad Harvill from Sacramento of the PCL. Optioned RHP Ariel Prieto to Sacramento. TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Activated 3B Vinny Castilla from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned OF Quinton McCracken to Durham of the International League. TEXAS RANGERS--Recalled INF Kelly Dransfeldt from Oklahoma of the PCL. Placed RHP Mark Clark on irrevocable waivers. TORONTO BLUE JAY--Activated RHP Peter Munro from 15-day disabled list and optioned him to Syracuse of the International League.

FOOTBALL Canadian Football League WINNIPEG BLUE BOMBERS--Signed FB Scott Deibert. Released FB Dan Pronyk.

HOCKEY National Hockey League CHICAGO BLACKHAWKS--Announced Denis Savard, assistant coach, will return next season. Named Don Jackson assistant coach. NEW JERSEY DEVILS--Signed F Jim McKenzie. MIDDLE TENNESSEE STATE--Named Kimberly St. John women's golf coach and Howard McMahan outside linebackers coach. NORTH CAROLINA-GREENSBORO--Named Lenda Butcher men's and women's assistant enhanced running coach.
